scripts.release:minor: tsc && pnpm version minor && pnpm publish --no-git-checks
scripts.release:patch: tsc && pnpm version patch && pnpm publish --no-git-checks
scripts.release:canary: tsc && pnpm version prerelease --preid=canary && pnpm publish --tag canary
scripts.gzip:watch: fd | entr zsh -c pnpm run gzip:check
scripts.gzip:check: cat out/main.js| gzip -9 > out/main.js.gz  && ls -la out/
